attributes.action: Introduce a sugar tax, as this product has no nutritional benefit but causes lots of diseases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Diabeties and obesity are both caused by high sugar junk foods.  If sugar was taxed manufactorers would be forced to make their food healthier.  The revenue from the tax could be put into the health service to educate people about what causes these diseases and how to stay healthy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
